texts.en: Rahim is a 50-year-old married man, a happy father and grandfather. He was born and grew up in difficult times and, hence, was used to hard work since his childhood. Rahim completed 9 grades of a secondary school and then went to a technical college to study as an electrician. Now he works part-time as an electrician in his village. Rahim also has his own business. He is involved in animal husbandry. He has 3 cows and 10 sheep on his land. His wife milks the cows and prepares sour-cream and cottage cheese from the milk. Rahim plans to expand his business and buy three lambs, but does not the required amount of money right now. This is why he requested financial support from MDO Arvand. He hopes that MDO Arvand will respond to his request for help and provide him with the needed amount. He is grateful in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy three lambs in order to expand his business

loans.name: Dinah

texts.en:
Dinah is 62 years old and married with three children. 

Dinah is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Dinah requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies for her business.

Dinah has been in pig fattening for three years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Dinah would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia works hard to support her family. Lucia is married and has a business buying and selling clothes in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more clothes to sell.

Lucia has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Lucia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell

loans.name: Gulnura

texts.ru: Гулнура, 21 год, не замужем, детей нет. У Гулнуры среднее образование, после окончания школы она работала в аекарне, но поняла, что у нее есть талант в шитье. На сегодняшний день она арендует помещение и шьет на заказ платья, куртки, юбки. Благодаря упорному труду Гулнуры, она развила бизнес и дала работу в своем цехе 6 девушкам. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 30,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку материала для пошива школьной формы, она уже получила заказ. Доходы от кредита позволят Гулнуре развить ее бизнес.
texts.en: Gulnura is 21 years old, not married and does not have children. Gulnura has a secondary education. She worked at a bakery after finishing school, but realized that she had a talent in sewing. Today, she leases space and sews dresses, coats and skirts to-order. Thanks to her hard work, Gulnura developed her business and provided work for 6 young women in her factory. Her monthly profit amounts to about 30,000 som (KGS). She requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy fabrics for sewing school uniforms that she already received an order for. The earnings from the loan will allow Gulnura to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for sewing school uniforms in order to grow her business

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario tiene 65 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Esta es una comunidad pequeña donde la vida es tranquila y sus pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Realiza esta actividad desde hace 6 años contando con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus clientes. Solicita préstamo para la compra de cerdos, patos, gallinas, cuyes, entre otros animales, para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Mario espera satifacer las necesidades y gustos de sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 65 years old and in a common-law relationship. He lives in his own home in a rural section of the District of Oyotún in Chiclayo Province. This area is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. Life in this small community is peaceful and its residents engage primarily in agriculture, raising animals, and trade.

Mario raises and sells farm animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys, and other livestock. His business is located at his house. Mario has been in this business for six years and has the necessary experience. He has good references from his customers.

Mario is requesting a loan in order to buy pigs, ducks, chickens, guinea pigs, and other animals so that he can increase the inventory of his business. With this loan Mario hopes to satisfy the needs and tastes of his customers, generate more income, and eventually improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs, ducks, chickens, guinea pigs, and other animals so that he can increase the inventory of his business.

loans.name: Maria  Silvia

texts.es: Maria de 48 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, ella se dedica a vender accesorios para el cabello (ganchos, colas, diademas, peinetas, etc.) ella esta ubicada en una zona my transitada cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, ella solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para poder comprar más mercadería por mayor y asi obtener mejores ganancias y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 48 years old and lives with her family unit in her own home. She works selling hair accessories (hairpins, extensions, hairbands, combs, etc.).  She set up shop in a very busy area close to her home, and she manages to support herself with the profit she makes. She's applying for a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can purchase more merchandise wholesale and that way increase profits and raise her standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase hair accessories (hairpins, extensions, hairbands, combs, etc.)

loans.name: Milton Elias

texts.es:
Milton de 37 años de edad, está casado y tiene tres hijos que están estudiando y dependen de él.


Milton ya tiene 15 años de trabajar en agricultura, cultiva maíz, frijol y jícama por lo cual es de donde él puede obtener sus ingresos para satisfacer las necesidades de su familia . 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar dos vacas lecheras que le van a generar ganancia.

Su sueño es tener 10 vacas lecheras,  ayudar a sus hijos a estudiar y que puedan sacar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Milton is 37 years old, married, and has three dependent children who are in school. He has worked in agriculture for 15 years. Milton grows corn, beans, and jicama. With the income he earns he is able to satisfy the needs of his family.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy two dairy cows for generating income. His dream is to have 10 dairy cows, which will help his children with their studies so that they can continue toward achieving a professional degree.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows for generating income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing machines for her husband's business

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Mujeres Emprendedoras; está en su ciclo número 13 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Hicieron la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde casi todas las integrantes ya están logrando superar la línea de pobreza; a través de las Capacitaciones del Plan de Negocios y Técnica en Ventas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Oilda quien vende todo tipo de prendas de manera ambulante para poder ayudar a su familia por medio de este trabajo que hace. Ella es una persona por demás luchadora y sacrificada.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar remeras, camisas, pantalones, bermudas; entre otros, de manera a poder tener una mejor variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group named “Mujeres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Women) is in its 13th loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. All of the members are working and helping one another move forward. They have taken the poverty elimination survey and the results indicated that almost all of the members have been able to rise above the poverty line. They have been able to achieve this because of the training seminars that cover business plans and sales techniques.

One of the members is Sra. Oilda, who sells all types of clothes as a street vendor. Through the work she does, she is able to help her family. Oilda is a determined and self-sacrificing individual. She is requesting a loan in order to buy T-shirts, shirts, trousers, Bermuda shorts, and other garments. This will allow her to have a wider variety that she can offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy T-shirts, shirts, trousers, Bermuda shorts, and other garments.

loans.name: Hayriniso

texts.en: Hayriniso is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1966. She is living in a rural area. She is married. Hayriniso is an active, honest, confident and kind person. She has a business planting agricultural products and knows her activity well. She likes to work on the land. She plants wheat, cereals and potatoes. Additionally, she keeps livestock and trades in the domestic market. Each profit she spends for family expenditures. Hayriniso requested a 3000 USD loan for making her standard of living better and to get home appliances. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to get home appliances.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en: Milagros is in the transportation business particularly motorcycle transport. She is 25 years old, married and has two children. With her aim to improve her income and living conditions, she is seeking additional capital of PHP 5,000. She will use this loan to repair and maintain her motorcycle transport and invest some amount to start up a hog raising business. In this way, she could be able to provide a comfortable and safe ride to all her passengers and gain better income. Milagros is looking forward to approval of her requested loan amount.

loans.use: to repair and maintain her motorcycle transport and invest some amount to start up a hog raising business.

loans.name: Concesa

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Concesa works hard to support her family.

She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Concesa is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her bakery business.

Concesa has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her bakery.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 30 years old and married with two children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Marissa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, sugar, eggs, etc.

Marissa has been in this business for six years.

In the future Marissa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Rosemarie works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell fish business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dry goods. Rosemarie is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Rosemarie has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
Marcial tiene 59 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos que se encuentran estudiando y dependen de él.


Marcial ya tiene 25 años de dedicarse a la agricultura y  albañilería ya que es de donde el obtiene sus ingresos para poder ayudar a sus hijos en el estudio y que no les falte el pan de cada día.

Este préstamo lo solicita para comprar tres novillas para engordarlas y venderlas dentro de un año, ya que para ese tiempo sus hijos se estarán graduando y así podrá asegurar el pago de los gastos que le va a generar.

El sueña con tener 5 vacas lecheras y ayudar a sus hijos en los estudios de la universidad.
texts.en:
Marcial is 59 years old. He is in a relationship and has two dependent children who are in school. Marcial has worked in agriculture for 25 years, but he is also a bricklayer by trade. With the income he earns, he is able to help his children with their studies and ensure that they have enough to eat each day.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy three heifers that he will fatten and sell within a year. By that time, his children will be graduating so he wants to make sure that he will be able to cover the related costs with the income he will generate.

Marcial’s dream is to have five dairy cows and help his children with their university studies.

loans.use: to buy three heifers that he will fatten and sell within a year.

loans.name: Berlyse

texts.en:
Berlyse is 26 years old. She is married with two children ages 1 and 4; they haven't gone to school yet. She owns a shop and has been running it for the past year, while her husband is a motorcyclist. 

With the loan, she would like to buy food stuffs such as rice, cassava flour and sugar to refill her shop.The profits form the business will be used to buy a cow for rearing. Barlyse's dream is to earn a minimum of 50,000 per month.

Berlyse's photo was taken at Urwego Opportunity Bank, where the client's meetings are usually held.

loans.use: To buy more rice, cassava flour and sugar.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a 40 year old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of two sons and two daughters.

Her son is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been running an auto rickshaw for the last five years. For the past many days, his rickshaw has not been working properly because of all the regular usage. He feels that most of its parts are out of order. So he is unable to generate any amount of income.

He wants to buy a new auto rickshaw. However due to a lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. Therefore Margret has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her son to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Margret is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her son.

loans.name: Talal

texts.en:
Talal is a 40-year-old married Palestinian refugee, the father of two children, who works hard to provide them with a better living and is working hard to develop their living by moving out of the camp they are living in to a better region.

Talal is a man with a very good reputation in his region. His work is going on just fine, but unfortunately, his business has limited sales because of its location inside the camp. He is working hard to diversify his products and attract customers' attention by providing them with special offer products that will increase his income.

That's why he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua. He will increase his sweets selection with special offer products that will attract children's attention and increase his income.

He hopes that in the future he can expand his working sector and open a supermarket that will cover his family's living needs.

loans.use: To increase his sweets selection with special offer products that will attract children's attention and increase his income

loans.name: Zafar

texts.en: Zafar is a hardworking man. He was born in 1985. He is living in a rural area. He is married. He has three children. He is an active, honest, responsible and gentle person. He has a family business. Zafar and his wife are busy with planting wheat, cereal and potatoes in their yard. Besides that, he is keeping livestock and sells in the domestic market. He gets 400 - 500 TJS from each cattle sold. His income is spent on family expenditures. Zafar is planning to widen his business and buy other horned cattle. He is asking financial support from Kiva project to buy horned cattle. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy horned cattle.

loans.name: Norida

texts.en:
Norida works hard to support her family. Norida is married and has been a rice mill operator for 3 years now. She operates her business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her rice mill.

In the future, Norida would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her rice mill

loans.name: Jairo Cristino

texts.es:
Jairo, de 26 años, estudió hasta tercer año de bachillerato, está soltero y por siete años consecutivos, se ha dedicado a la agricultura, es por eso que ha aprendido a realizar muy bien este trabajo.

Debido a que no siempre se puede trabajar en la agricultura por los cambios de clima, Jairo, también trabaja en una tienda.

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar una moto, para transportarse a su lugar de trabajo, ya que está a más de diez kilómetros de distancia.

Jairo, tiene grandes anhelos en la vida y es por eso que se esfuerza día a día, para ahorrar un poco de su salario y a si poder tener su propia casa, para que cuando tenga su propia familia, pueda brindarles una vivienda digna.
texts.en:
Jairo is 26 years old and got as far as the third year of high school in his education. He's single and for seven straight years he has worked in agriculture, that's how he has learned to do this job very well.

Due to the fact that it's not always possible to work in agriculture because of changes in climate, Jairo also works in a store.

He'll use the loan to purchase a motorcycle to travel to his workplace, since the distance is over ten kilometers away.

Jairo has big dreams in life and that's why he works hard every day, to save a bit of his salary and be able to have a house of his own,  so that he can start a family of his own and provide them a respectable home.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Paola Andrea

texts.es:
Ella es Paola una joven de 27 años de edad, soltera, muy responsable y atenta con su negocio de venta de mercancía como lo es ropa interior de mujer, pijamas y lencería en general, Paola aspira en unos años poder tener un local, generar empleo, diversificar su oferta y pensar en estudiar una carrera universitaria, por eso trabaja diariamente entre 10 y 12 horas para generar recursos extras y formar un ahorro programado para ir cumpliendo uno a uno sus sueños.
Su idea es ser más competitiva, agresiva en el mercado, por ello quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de mercancía como lo es lencería y pijamas, introducir nuevos diseños y estilos no vistos en el mercado atrayendo un mercado y creando una necesidad en el cliente.
texts.en:
This is Paola, a single young woman who is 27 years of age. She is very responsible and attentive with her business of selling merchandise such as women’s undergarments, pajamas, and lingerie. Within a few years Paola aspires to have her own shop, create jobs, diversify her product offerings, and begin studying for a university degree. For this reason she works 10 to 12 hours each day. This allows her to generate additional income so that she can begin a savings program that will help her accomplish her goals one at a time.

Her idea is to become more competitive and aggressive in the marketplace. For this reason, she is requesting a loan in order to buy merchandise, such as lingerie and pajamas. This will allow her to introduce new designs and styles that haven’t been seen in the market. She hopes this will attract business and create a need among her customers.

loans.use: to buy pajamas and women's lingerie to sell.

loans.name: San Antonio De Padua Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama San Antonio de Padua  está en su ciclo número 19 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo bastante unido, donde todas se están esforzando por poder salir adelante. Además forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza como un medio para poder mejorar sus vidas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra.  Sunilda quien es modista quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir un nivel extremo de pobreza. Ella a  través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza.
La Sra. Sunilda solicita de este préstamo para la compra de Tela, Hilo y Agujas, y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y más venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group named “San Antonio de Padua” is in its 19th loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. The members have formed a unified group and all of them are striving to move forward. They are also participating in the poverty elimination program so that they will be able to improve their lives.

One of the members is Sra. Sunilda, who works as a seamstress. Her latest survey indicated that she was at a Stage 1 poverty level, which means that she is at an extreme level of poverty. Sunilda is able to improve her poverty situation through her effort and continuous work, as well as by applying the vital behaviors that are characteristic of a successful woman.

Sra. Sunilda is requesting a loan in order to buy fabric, thread, needles, and other supplies. This will enable her to achieve greater production and more sales, which will help to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles, and other supplies.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
Ramona hoy tiene 67 años, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, ella se dedica a las ventas ambulantes de todo tipo de productos, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en la compra de productos variados, con lo cual pudo cumplir con las demandas de sus clientes.
Ramona pide nuevamente de este préstamo para poder invertirlo nuevamente en la compra de edredones, termos y otros para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Ramona is now 67 years old. She is a hardworking and determined individual who sells all types of products as a traveling vendor. Ramona says that her previous loan was used to buy various products. As a result, she was able to fulfill the demands of her customers.

Ramona is requesting a loan once again so that she can make a new investment in the purchase of bedspreads, thermoses, and other products. This will allow her to continue making sales just as before.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads, thermoses, and other products.

loans.name: Allin Kausay Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “ALLIN KAUSAY”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosaura ella es conviviente y tiene 30 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar pantalones, polos, chompas, casacas y blusas.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de hotel, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en: These members belong to the communal bank "ALLIN KAUSAY"; this bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. The partner is Mrs. Rosaura. She is married, 30 years old, and has 2 sons. She works in her business selling clothes. She sells pants, blouses, and shirts. She already has several years experience in this business and it is going very well. Mrs. Rosaura's dream is to have a bazaar. She is requesting this loan to buy pants, shirts, sweaters, jackets and blouses. The other members work in the hotel business, clothing sales, grocery store, and restaurant business. Mrs. Rosaura is grateful to those who are part of this dream through this medium and agrees to comply with the payment of their fees by the deadline.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, sweaters, jackets and blouses

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.en:
Gulchehra is a confident woman. She was born in 1970 and lives in a remote district. She is married and has five children. It is hard for her to feed her big family.

Gulchehra is a seamstress. She sews traditional dresses for women and has been providing these services for about 10 years. She knows her duty well, and all of her clients are satisfied with her work.

Gulchehra needs to buy a sewing machine so that she can improve the productivity of her work. She is asking for financial support consisting of a 4,000 TJS loan to buy a sewing machine. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.en:
Guadalupe manages her hog raising, variety store, and transportation businesses. Currently, she's raising three sows.

Guadalupe would like to keep her hogs healthier and maintain them, but her capital is not sufficient. Therefore, she is asking for additional capital of PHP 50,000. She will use this loan amount to buy hog supplies for her livestock business as well as grocery items for her variety store. She believes that she can further improve her income and keep her businesses profitable someday.

In the picture, Guadalupe is wearing a white t-shirt and is accompanied by her husband.

loans.use: to buy hog supplies for her livestock business and grocery items for her variety store.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is a responsible housewife who owns and manages a small retail store within her local community. Due to hardship of living, she aims to make her business more profitable in order to generate sufficient income and sustain the necessities of her family.

She wants to acquire more grocery items to sell, but she has limited capital. For this reason, she would like to avail herself of a loan of PHP 25,000.00 to buy more fish sauce, soft drinks, sugar, cooking oil, rice, and other grocery items to resell. Through this loan, Leonida believes that she will continue improving her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish sauce, soft drinks, sugar, cooking oil, rice and other grocery items to resell

loans.name: Prospera Group

texts.es:
La comunidad donde se encuentra el grupo Prospera está rodeada de sembradíos de caña y alberga 2 fábricas que transforman el fruto en azúcar.

El nombre de la asociación se debe a las actividades económicas que ayudan a cada una de las integrantes a prosperar y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia; ellas son:

Deodora – Tacos y tortas
Dora - Calzado Por Catalogo 
Ana – Cosméticos, Calzado Por Catalogo Y Plata.
Soledad – Pollo

Formar parte de una familia de comerciantes es lo que motivó a Deodora a vender tacos y tortas desde hace ya 10 años. Lo mejor de tener su propio negocio es tener un ingreso para apoyar con los gastos de su hogar. Si bien al principio le fue un poco difícil estabilizar su taquería, principalmente por la competencia, sus precios y atención a los clientes le ayudaron a tener éxito. Actualmente también tiene una cocina económica y tres pequeños carros para vender churros y antojitos en las ferias de su comunidad. Deodora ama estar ocupada e invertir su tiempo de la mejor manera. Además a cada uno de sus negocios y carrito de feria los ha llamado con el nombre de alguno de sus 5 hijos, para recordarles constantemente acerca del patrimonio que está consolidando para cada uno de ellos con base en su esfuerzo y compromiso.  

“La experiencia hace la diferencia, además del estilo de la preparación de la carne” comenta Deodora al hablar del atributo que la distingue en las ferias y bailes en los que tiene la fortuna de vender.

Actualmente Deodora necesita un nuevo préstamo el cual invertirá en la compra de carne, chiles, ajo, jamaica, arroz, cebolla, mayonesa, leche, azúcar, pan, platos desechables, refrescos, jugos y agua para comenzar a prepararse para las ferias que hay en marzo.

“Estoy muy contenta el ver feliz a mi familia, eso me motiva y me da las fuerzas necesarias para iniciar un nuevo día con buena actitud. Hace un mes mi hija Ari me dijo le gustaría tener su propio negocio", Deodora apoyó a su hija quien maneja una tienda de abarrotes ubicada al lado de la taquería, lo que la hace sentirse de orgullo al saber que sus hijos están siguiendo su ejemplo de trabajar por lo que quieren lograr. 

*La fotografía fue tomada en la taquería de doña Deodora quien viste falda color azul marino. En la fotografía se observan 5 mujeres pues Ari pidió la oportunidad de salir en la foto y expresar la felicidad que siente pues su madre le ha ayudado a hacer realidad uno de sus sueños. Ari viste el suéter color mostaza.
texts.en:
The Prospera Group is located in a community that is surrounded by sugar-cane fields and is home to two factories that convert the fruit into sugar.

The name of the association comes from the economic activities that help each one of the members to prosper and provide their families with a better quality of life.  They are: Deodora, who sells tacos and sandwiches; Dora, who sells catalog footwear; Ana, who sells cosmetics, catalog footwear, and silver; and Soledad, who sells chicken.

Being part of a family of businesspersons was what motivated Deodora to sell tacos and sandwiches ten years ago, and the best part of having her own business is having an income to help with her home’s expenses.   Although it was a little difficult to establish her taco stand, mainly because of competition, her prices and customer service helped her to become successful.  

Currently, she also has a food stand and three small wagons for selling churros and antojitos [traditional snacks] at fairs in her community.  Deodora loves being busy and investing her time in the best way possible; she has also named each of her businesses and wagons after one of her five children, in order to constantly remind them of the legacy that she is building for each one of them through her effort and commitment.

“Experience makes the difference, in addition to the way the meat is prepared”, comments Deodora, when speaking of the attribute that distinguishes her at the fairs and dances in which she is fortunate to be able to sell.

Currently, Deodora needs a new loan, which she will invest in the purchase of meat, peppers, garlic, allspice, rice, onions, mayonnaise, milk, sugar, bread, disposable plates, soft drinks, juices, and water, in order to begin preparing for the fairs in March.

“I’m very glad to see that my family is happy. That motivates me and gives me the strength I need to start the new day with a good attitude.  A month ago, my daughter Ari told me that she wanted to have her own business.”  Deodora supported her daughter, who runs a grocery store next to the taco stand.  It makes her feel proud, knowing that her children are following her example of working for what they want to achieve.

*The photograph was taken in Doña Deodora’s taco stand. She is wearing the navy blue skirt.  Five women can be seen in the photograph, as Ari asked to be given the opportunity to be in the photo, and express the happiness that she feels because her mother has helped her to make one of her dreams a reality.  Ari is wearing the mustard-colored sweater.

loans.use: to purchase meat, peppers, garlic, allspice, rice, onions, mayonnaise, milk, sugar, bread, disposable plates, soft drinks, juices, and water.

loans.name: Esteban Eduardo

texts.es:
Esteban tiene 24 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa familiar junto a sus hijos en la provincia de Morropón que se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, además de el comercio.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su mototaxi, actividad que realiza desde hace más de 4 años, cuenta con clientes fijos en la zona quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo será para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Esteban espera ofrecer un servicio de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que le va a generar mayores ingresos y va a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Esteban is 24 years old.  He is in a common-law relationship. He lives in the family house with his children in the province of Morropon, which is located in the region of Piura, on the north coast of Peru.  Life in the community is tranquil.  The inhabitants work in agriculture, ranching and also commerce.

He works at offering transport services in his mototaxi (three-wheeled motorcycle with a roof).  He has been doing this for 4 years.  He has steady clients in the area that give him very good personal and work references.

The loan will be to carry out repairs and maintenance of his vehicle since it is in poor condition.  With this, Esteban hopes to offer his clients a better quality of service. This will generate greater income and permit him to improve the quality of his life and that of his family.

loans.use: to carry out repairs and maintenance of his taxi vehicle since it is in poor condition

loans.name: Mailyn

texts.en:
Mailyn is 42 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Mailyn is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Mailyn has been raising pigs for five years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Mailyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Gredin

texts.es: Gredin, tiene la edad  de 37 años, está soltero,  vive solo. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  de fertilizantes adecuados para la siembra del almácigo  del cultivo de café, además realizar algunos trabajos de mejoramiento del suelo por medio de labores culturales como lo es evitar la erosión del suelo por medio del agua de lluvia, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación, de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo de café, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de este cultivo. Además tener un buen desarrollo y sanidad del cultivo al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso  seguir invirtiendo más en el cultivo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Gredin is 37 years old, single, and lives alone. With his loan, he intends to purchase enough fertilizer for the planting of coffee seedings, as well as to do some work to improve the soil by way of crop methods, like preventing soil erosion caused by rain. He also wants to be able to pay the labor for applying the products and assistance on the plantation. This way he can ensure that he does a good job. What he intends is to take advantage for the good climatic and soil conditions in his area for this sort of coffee farming, as well as put into practice the experience he has in managing this farming. He also wants to have positive development and healthy farming practices as well as an adequate crop, and have high output in the near future. With the revenue, he will continue to invest more in the farming. It is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He had not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with better payment terms and the interest is much lower.

loans.use: to plant coffee seedlings

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita works hard to support her family. Rosita is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 2 years now.

Rosita requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

In the future, Rosita would like to save money to expand her buisness.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Wilfredo, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casado y su esposa estudio hasta quinto grado, tiene tres hijos, los cuales están estudiando.

Wilfredo, se dedica a la agricultura y a la venta de pan, tiene quince años de dedicarse a la venta de pan.

Wilfredo, necesita el crédito para comprar una moto, para poder vender el pan en las calles y lograr llegar a más lugares con la motocicleta.

El sueño de Wilfredo, es poder construir su vivienda de ladrillo y también apoyar a sus tres hijos para que puedan estudiar hasta que se formen como profesionales y tengan mejores oportunidades en el área laboral.
texts.en: Wilfredo is 34 years old. He studied until sixth grade. He is married and his wife studied until fifth grade. He has three children who are studying. Wilfredo makes a living through agriculture and selling bread. He has worked selling bread for fifteen years. Wilfredo needs this loan to buy a motorcycle, so he can sell bread in the streets and make it to more places with his motorcycle. Wilfredo's dream is to be able to build a brick house and also to help his three children so they can study until they can become professionals and have better opportunities in the workplace.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Jova

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LOS CORAZONES VALIENTES DE MORRO SAN JUAN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Jova se dedica al trabajo como limpieza de edificios, la socia por medio de este trabajo quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar un televisor para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Jova is a member of the communal bank “LOS CORAZONES VALIENTES DE MORRO SAN JUAN.” The bank is located in the district of Santa Ana, in the  province of La Convención and the region of Cusco.

Jova makes a living cleaning buildings. By means of this work, she wants to get ahead. Her dream is to have a grocery store. She is asking for the loan to buy a television for her house. 

She is grateful for the loan and promises to pay the installments.

loans.use: to buy a television for her house.

loans.name: Dalila Guadalupe

texts.es: Dalila tiene 34 años de edad y vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace mas de 4 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, gracias a lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, Dalila está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dalila is 34 years old and lives in her own home along with her two children. She has a small store at her place of residence. Dalila has been in business for more than four years and has many customers because of the good prices and the friendliness that she displays when making sales. Thanks to the income she generates from her sales, Dailia has been able to get ahead.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet bread, and other products. This will allow her to earn more income so that she can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet bread, and other products.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 51 years old, married to a driver, and they're blessed with two children. Yolanda owns and manages a direct selling business where she sells personal use products in their village. With this business she earns a net income of PHP 20,000 a month.

Because she has insufficient capital for it, she would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to PHP 50,000 to purchase clothes, shoes, bags, lingerie, and beauty products to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to become more profitable and more improved.

loans.use: to purchase clothes, shoes, bags, lingerie, and beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en: Magdalena, a hardworking widow, requested a loan from Paglaum MPC which she will use to increase her inventory. She wants to buy more kilos of fruits and vegetables for resale. This way, she will be able to sell more products which will allow her to earn more money and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more kilos of fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
Georgina is 59 years old and married with four children.

Georgina is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Georgina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Georgina has been in pig fattening for 15 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Georgina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Vergelia

texts.en:
Vergelia is a married woman with two children. She is 30 years old and has two children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Vergelia has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 2 years. Vergelia requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, spices, vegetables, fish, etc. for her business.

In the future, Vergelia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, spices, vegetables, fish, etc. for her business

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 58 years old and married with ten children.

Delia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, eggs, groceries, etc.

Delia has borrowed and paid back six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from buying and selling rice.

Delia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, beverages, eggs, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing netting and gasoline.

Maribeth has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, Maribeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing netting and gasoline.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Dolores is 49 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Dolores has a furniture making business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 26 years. Dolores requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more materials like wood, nails, paints, etc. for her business.

In the future, Dolores would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials like wood, nails, paints, etc. for her furniture making business.

loans.name: Rizza

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Rizza works hard to support her family. She has a dried fish business in the Philippines and also earns income from a general store. Rizza is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy fish for her dried fish business.

Rizza has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish for her dried fish business.

loans.name: Teodocia

texts.en:
Teodocia works hard to support her family. Teodocia is widowed and has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

Teodocia has been in this business for three years now.

In the future Teodocia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Pureza

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Pureza works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling ready-to-wear items in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Pureza is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy shirts, shorts, socks and raw materials to sell in her stall for her buy-and-sell ready-to-wear business.

Pureza has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, which is to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy shirts, shorts, socks and raw materials to sell in her stall.

loans.name: Ceres

texts.en:
Ceres works hard to support her family. Ceres is married and has a buy-and-sell pigs business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional pigs to sell.

Ceres has been in this business for seven years now. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Ceres would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs to sell.

loans.name: Sherilyn

texts.en:
Sherilyn is 33 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Sherilyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Sherilyn has been raising pigs for one year and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 34 years old and married with eight children. Four of her children are in school.

Elisa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Elisa has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from raising livestock.

Elisa aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Maria Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian, de 53 años de edad, estudio hasta primer grado, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, por que no contaba con el apoyo suficiente para seguir estudiando, fue por esa razón que se dedico a los oficios domésticos y a criar animales, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos, tiene 5 hijos que actualmente están estudiando.

Lilian, actualmente se dedica a la crianza de animales, ella compra, produce,criá y vende animales; ese oficio lo apréndio de su mamá desde que tenia 13 años y hoy puso lo ha puesto en práctica, dicho negocio lo tiene en su terreno, sus hijos y su esposo le ayudan a la limpieza y a darle la alimentación a los animales.

Lilian, solicito el préstamo para comprar una ternera, porque se la están vendiendo en buen precio y tambien para continuar con su negocio.

Los sueños de Lilian, son seguir adelante con su negocio y que sea muy rentable, para que sus hijos sean personas puedan pagar la universidad en un fututo.
texts.en: Lilian, 53, studied until first grade. She did not have the opportunity to study further because she did not have enough support to continue studying. For this reason, she has made a living through domestic chores and breeding animals. She is married and her husband makes a living sowing basic grains. She has 5 children who are currently studying. Lilian is currently making a living through raising animals. She buys, produces, breeds, and sells animals; this trade she learned from her mother when she was 13 and today she puts her training into practice. This business is on her land and her husband and children help to clean and feed the animals. Lilian requests a loan to buy a calf, because they are selling at a good price, and also to continue with her business. Lilian's dreams are to keep advancing her business and make it very profitable, so that her children can be people who can pay for university in the future.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Najma

texts.en: Najma is the age of 51, the mother of five children, living with her spouse and children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her son is a green grocer by profession, and he has been selling fresh fruits at a shop in a nearby town for many years. Her son offers seasonal and fresh fruits to his customers. He has been feeding his family through the generated income from this fruit shop. Nowadays, the needs of his family suddenly increased and he does not have other sources to cope with these needs. So he decided to expand his current business. He wants to increase his stock on a daily basis so that he can maximize sales of the fruits. Therefore his mother, Najma,  requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her son can buy excess seasonal fruits. Najma thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more fresh fruits for her son's fruit sale shop

loans.name: Leonardo Rodrigo

texts.es:
Leonardo es un joven estudiante de Medicina, el solicita un prestamo para poder pagar sus estudios y esta es su historia:Mi nombre es Leonardo, tengo 23 años de edad y vivo actualmente en La Ermita en el sector Gurabo. Tengo 3 hermanas y 1 hermano. Soy soltero, no tengo hijos y vivo actualmente con una de mis hermanas y mi madre la cual se desempeña como enfermera. 
Actualmente estudio Medicina en UTESA-Santiago, carrera que escogí gracias a la gran atracción que desde pequeño he tenido por conocer como estamos compuestos, cuales procesos se producen en el ser humano y el porqué de los mismos. Actualmente he tomado todas las materias del nivel inicial del cual puedo decir que Fundamentos de Fisiología y Biofísica son mis materias favoritas.
Estoy solicitando el crédito para mis estudios debido a que el nivel en que estoy es difícil conseguir empleo y tener un buen desarrollo académico. Mi madre es quien me ha estado ayudando con el coste de mis estudios pero fue diagnosticada con una enfermedad terminal hace poco y, a partir de ahí,  las cosas se han complicado. Esta ayuda sería un gran impulso para mí, yo lo veo como una facilidad para mis estudios que con tanta dificultad y esfuerzo he llevado hasta el sol de hoy y, definitivamente, sería un giro total a todos los aspectos de mi vida.
Mi meta es prepararme y llegar al final de mi carrera con el mejor índice posible, quiero desempeñarme como médico para ser ejemplo de aquellos que dicen no poder contra las adversidades, quiero unir a mi familia y sobre todo darle paz a mi madre, que deje de trabajar tanto y poder atenderla como ella merece. Mi sueño y mi ideal es ayudar a mejorar la vida de los demás y provocar cambios positivos en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Leonardo is a young medicine student. He is requesting this loan to pay for his studies and this is his story: 

"My name is Leonardo. I am 23 years old and currently live in La Ermita in the Gurabo sector. I have 3 sisters and 1 brother. I am single, I don't have any children, and I am currently living with one of my sisters and my mother, who works as a nurse. 

Currently, I study medicine at UTESA-Santiago. I chose my major because, since I was little, I have always wanted to learn what we're made of, which processes happen within human beings, and why they happen. Currently, I have taken all of the entry-level classes, and of those, I can say that 'Fundamentals of Physiology' and 'Biophysics' are my favorite subjects. 

I am requesting this loan for my studies because, at the level I'm at, it's hard to get a job and make progress academically. My mother has been helping me with the cost of my studies but she was just diagnosed with a terminal illness and, from there, things have gotten complicated. This assistance would be a big boost for me. I see it as a way of making my studies easier, as it's been difficult and it's taken a lot of effort to make it this far. It would definitely turn everything around for me. 

My goal is to prepare myself and make it to the end of my major with the best academic average possible. I want to work as a doctor and be an example for those who say they can't overcome adversity. I want to bring my family together and, above all, bring my mother peace, so that she can stop working so much and to be able look after her like she deserves. My dream is to help improve the lives of others and to bring about positive changes in society. "

loans.use: with higher education costs

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma is aged 30 and is the mother of three children, living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a cigarette and paan shop for many years near his house. The business is operating very well.

Due the demand of his customers, he wants to offer juices, soft drinks, cold drinks etc. He does not want to have to refuse any products and disappoint his respected customers. He wants to offer all those products which are necessary and consumable on a daily basis. In this way, he will successfully win the trust of his customers and increase his income as well.

Therefore, Asma requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband could buy cigarettes, paan, juices, soft drinks, cold drinks etc. for his shop. She is very glad to be taking this loan and hopeful that her husband will successfully fulfill each request for any item and prevent the disappointment of his customers.

Asma is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy cigarettes, paan, juices, soft drinks, cold drinks etc. for her husband's shop.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 26-year-old divorced man who opened his current clothes and shoes selling shop in June 2013 to develop his living and make a good income.

Khaled is a hard working man, who puts so much effort into developing his business. He used to be a soldier, but he searched for a business that will help him settle down and make a typical family of his own.

Khaled's income is good but not enough to increase his business capital and diversify his products with special collections. Thus for this reason he is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to increase his business merchandise with special spring and summer collections, especially for the coming Mother's Day celebrations on March 21st.

He hopes to expand in his region through opening several branches in the future.

loans.use: to increase his business merchandise with special spring and summer collections.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new collection of clothes.

loans.name: Manitos De Oro Ii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MANITOS DE ORO II” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Marizol es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, venta de CD’s, venta de salchipapas, venta de ropa, salón de belleza, venta de frazadas, venta de verduras, venta de frutas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Marizol es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción masiva de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace un año al apoyar en el negocio familiar de su tía, posteriormente decide implementar un negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz y fideo por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en: The group "MANITOS DE ORO II" will start the third cycle in Pro Mujer as part of Centro Focal de Collpani. The group is composed of 9 members and is headed by a board, where Mrs. Marizol is the President. The members of this community association are involved in businesses including: neighbourhood store, CD sales, salchipapas (kebab) sales, clothing sales, beauty salon, blanket sales, vegetable sales, fruit sales. Mrs. Marizol was integral to getting the loan that achieved benefits for the small microentrepreneurs. She points out that it has been one year since making up Pro Mujer, joining at the invitation of a massive promotion at the institution that helps realize goals in her region. Currently Mrs. Marizol has a business selling food. She discloses that she learned this business a year ago to help with the family business of her aunt. Afterwards she decided to start an independent business. The loan she asks for now is for the increase of capital by buying wholesale rice and noodles from the wholesale sellers in the city of La Paz, which she can subsequently sell at her stall. This form of work permits her to generate resources to help her family economically, since she is single and has a son. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy wholesale rice and noodles

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 38-year-old married mother of five children. She has been working in raising cows and trading with their milk to produce natural dairy products since August 2014. She already had four years of experience in this domain.

Iman used to work with her husband in their butchery, but their family's increasing living needs, made her think in broad terms for a better way to support her husband and cover their family's needs properly. That's why she started her own cow raising business. This way she can benefit her husband, who works as a butcher, through raising some cows he might need for his business, and at the same time she raised her own productive cows that give her a good income through their milk.

Iman is an ambitious lady, she is working hard to increase the number of cows she owns. For this reason, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to buy a new cow to increase her milk production and sales.

She hopes that in the future she will have a bigger farm and establish her own dairy production factory.

loans.use: to buy a new cow to increase her milk production and sales.

loans.name: Las Rosas De Calca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS ROSAS DE CALCA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nicolaza ella es conviviente y tiene 33 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de restaurant, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de leña, negocio de venta de comida, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de verduras.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Communal Bank “Las Rosa de Calca” (The Roses of Calca). The bank is located in the District of Calca in Calca Province, Department of Cusco.

Sra. Nicolaza is one of the members. She is 33 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has four children. Nicolaza works at her restaurant business. She prepares different dishes such as baked chicken, soups, and stir-fried beef. Nicolaza works from 8:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M. She has been in business for eight years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her restaurant. She is requesting a loan in order to buy products for cooking such as rice, vegetables, and chicken.

The other group members engage in businesses such as selling firewood, selling food, managing a grocery store, and selling vegetables.

Nicolaza is grateful to those who have helped her to fulfill her dream in this manner, so she promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for cooking such as rice, vegetables, and chicken.

loans.name: Eda

texts.es:
Eda tiene 47 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Morropón que se encuentra ubicado en la región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, ademas de el comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros y a la venta de comida, realiza esta actividad desde hace más de 10 años contando con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos. El crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de aves para incrementar su negocio así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estas, con esto Eda espera ofrecer mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos que le van a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Eda is 47 years old and in a common law marriage. She lives in her own house next to her children in the district of Morropón, which is located in the Piura region on the north coast of Peru. Life in the community is quiet and the residents work in agriculture and ranching, as well as trade. Eda works at breeding and selling birds such as chickens, ducks, turkeys etc., and the sale of food. She has performed this activity for over 10 years so she has experience in this business and good references from her neighbours. This loan will be used to purchase a greater number of birds to expand her business as well as balanced food for fattening them. With this loan Eda hopes to offer a better variety of animals to her customers, allowing her to obtain a better income which will afford a better quality of life to her and her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater number of birds to increase her business and balanced food to fatten them

loans.name: Meerim

texts.ru: Мээрим, 22 года, замужем, есть 2 детей. У Мээрим среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Мээрим, на сегодняшний день у нее есть корова и земельный надел мерою 2,1 ГА, где она выращивает картофель и фасоль. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет около 11,000 сом (KGS). Мээрим обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) для закупки семян, удобрений, часть средств будет потрачена на покупку коровы. Мээрим намерена улучшить благосостояние своей семьи и доходы от кредита направлять на развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Meerim is 22 and married with two children. She has a high school education and works in agriculture and animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family. Thanks to her hard work, purposefulness and effort, she currently has one cow and 2.1 hectares of land where she grows potatoes and beans. Her monthly income is about 11,000 KGS. 

Meerim has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 KGS to purchase seeds and fertilizers as well as a cow. She intends to improve her family's well-being and to put profits from the loan toward developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers in order to grow organic vegetables, and to buy one cow

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Saima is the age of 35 and a mother of four children, living with her husband. Her brother owns an electrical shop in which he sells light bulbs, troubleshoots bulbs and provides lighting decoration services at weddings, birthdays and engagement ceremonies. He preserves his bulbs in cardboard boxes. A few days ago his boxes fell down from a shelter and most of the light bulbs have broken. Now he does not have sufficient bulbs in stock to sell and does not have decoration lights to provide services.
 
Therefore, Saima requested a loan for her brother so that he can buy new light bulbs to sell and for decoration lights to provide decoration services. 

Saima thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to enhance in her brother's lighting decoration and electrical shop.

loans.name: Adalat

texts.ru: Адалат, 58 лет, замужем, есть сын. Адалат в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1990 году. Благодаря упорному труду Адалат, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 4 коровы, 65 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 26,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Адалат планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Adalat is 58 and married with one son. She works in animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began in 1990. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has four cows and 65 sheep on her farm with a monthly income of about 26,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Adalat has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 KGS to purchase livestock. She plans to put profits from the loan toward further developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 57 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Virginia is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Virginia has been in this business for 12 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Altynkul

texts.ru: Алтынкуль, 37 лет, замужем и имеет 4 детей. В качестве основного источника дохода своей семьи, Алтынкуль занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес 14 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Алтынкуль, на сегодня в хозяйстве имеется 1 корова, 50 овец. Она арендует 13 Га земли, в собственности есть еще 0,80 Га, где она выращивает картофель, фасоль и клевер. деятельность приносит Алтынкуль ежемесячный доход в сумме около 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Алтынкуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 110,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 20 овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства, чтобы накопить на постройку большого сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Altynkul is 37 and married with four children. She works in animal husbandry and agriculture as the primary source of income for her family, a business she started 14 years ago. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has one cow and 50 sheep on her farm. She also grows potatoes, beans and clover on 0.8 hectares of her own and 13 hectares of rented land. Her business brings in about 15,000 KGS per month.

With the goal of further developing her business, Altynkul has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 110,000 KGS to purchase 20 sheep. She plans to put profits from the loan into further improving her farm, so she can save toward building a big livestock barn.

loans.use: to purchase 20 sheep for fattening and resale

loans.name: Marina Concepcion

texts.es: Marian de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil, ella posee un chalet donde inicio vendiendo refrescos con el tiempo fue mejorando y hoy vende pupusas y comida su negocio esta ubicado cerca de la unidad de salud, tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de quesillo, chicharrón, frijoles, huevos, maíz, tomates, refrescos y demás productos todo por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Marina is 55 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband, who works as a bricklayer. She has a vending stall where she started out selling soft drinks. Over time, her business improved and now she sells “pupusas” (stuffed tortillas) and other foods. Her business is located near a health clinic and she has many customers. With the income she earns from her sales and with help from her husband, the two of them have been able to get ahead.

Marina is requesting a loan once again in order to buy cheese, pork skins, beans, eggs, corn, tomatoes, soft drinks, and other products in bulk so that she can continue her sales and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy cheese, pork skins, beans, eggs, corn, tomatoes, soft drinks, and other products in bulk.

loans.name: Juan Ruben

texts.es:
Ruben es un hombre de 26 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y su negocio es el comercio de ganado.
Él es emprendedor, paciente, fuerte, optimista, responsable y trabajador. Su trabajo lo desarrolla en la comunidad ‘Condoriri’ que se encuentra situado al pie de una zona glaciar, 15 picos nevados dan lugar por debajo a la formación de praderas, bofedales y lagos de esmeraldas ricos en avifauna; Llamas y Alpacas pasean en las colinas, los venados corren a sus escondrijos para evitar el acecho de los cóndores, es un rincón de magia andina. Este lugar se encuentra  a 4.400 metros sobre el nivel del mar, de clima frio y seco.
Ruben es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos obscuros, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general. Su vida la realiza cuidando a sus padres que son bastante ancianos y ya no pueden trabajar, viven en una casa propia construida de adobe que cuenta con agua de pozo y electricidad. Su negocio es el comercio de ganado, él se dedica a comprar terneros para criarlos engordarlos y venderlos. “actualmente nos ocupamos de comerciar ganado mejorado, tiene mayor valor en el mercado y se adapta mejor a las condiciones climáticas del lugar…” comenta. Su sueño es tener un establo amplio dónde pueda guardar a su ganado en mejores condiciones, él desea realizar la compra de terneros para su crianza y engordarlos. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 7 años que viene realizando esta actividad de manera independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Ruben solicita un préstamo para la compra de terneros para su crianza y engorde y con los beneficios cuidar a sus padres.
texts.en: Ruben is a man of 26 years of age, single, without children, and his business is trading cattle. He is an entrepreneur, patient, strong, optimistic, responsible, and hardworking. His work developed in the 'Condoriri' community which is located at the foot of a glacier area. 15 snowy peaks lead below to the formation of grasslands, wetlands and emerald lakes rich in bird life. Llamas and alpacas walk in the hills, deer run to their hideouts to avoid the stalking of the condors--it is a corner of Andean magic. This place is located 4400 metres above sea level with a cold and dry climate. Ruben is dark-skinned with black short hair, dark eyes, low stature, and a slender physique. His mother tongue is Aymará which is spoken in this place and he also speaks Spanish for general culture. He cares for his parents who are quite elderly and can no longer work. They live in their own house built of adobe that has well water and electricity. Ruben's business is trading cattle. He makes a living buying calves for fattening and selling. "Currently we are busy with an improved cattle trade, they have better value at the market and adapt better to the climate conditions in this place," he says. His dream is to have a large barn where he can keep the cattle in better conditions. He wants to make the purchase of calves for rearing and fattening. This is the first sequence of loans with this institution in 7 years that has been doing this activity independently. It is for these reasons that Ruben is applying for a loan to buy calves for rearing and fattening and therefore benefits to care for his parents.

loans.use: to buy calves for rearing and fattening and benefits to care for his parents

loans.name: Jose Julio

texts.es:
Julio, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar, han procreado dos hijos, pero ya no viven con ellos.

Julio, se dedica a la comercialización de maíz en elote, desde hace mucho tiempo conoce muy bien este negocio, de las ganancias obtenidas de este negocio, ha logrado darles lo necesario a sus dos hijos y hoy le permite llevar el sustento a su familia como siempre.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar maíz en elote para venderlo en un mejor precio.

Julio, desea fortalecer más su negocio y así obtener mejores ganancias, para seguir llevando el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Julio studied through the ninth grade. He is in a relationship and his partner takes care of the household duties. They have two children, but they no longer live with them.

Julio has been selling corn for quite some time. He is very knowledgeable about this business and the income he has earned allowed him to provide for the needs of his two children. Today he is able to sustain his family as always.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy corn that he can sell at a good price. Julio wants to strengthen his business even more so that he can generate a better income in order to continue supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy corn that he can sell at a good price.

loans.name: Dúo Jeshua Group

texts.es: Dúo Jeshua Es integradas por las socias Ana Cristina  residente de San Juan Sacatepéquez, se dedica al comercio  Doña Ana Cristina nos comenta que ella elabora RonRon o Chicharras de feria y Sombrillas que le solicitan constantemente por lo que necesita invertir mas en materiales para la realización de los mismos también tiene su pequeña Torilleria y necesita comprar mas maíz y leña , por lo cual se avoca a la institución para solicitar un nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Jeshua Group

One of the members is Ana Cristina, a resident of San Juan Sacatepéquez who works in the retail trade. Doña Ana Cristina says that she makes “ronrones” (a traditional Guatemalan toy), “chicharras de feria” (handmade toys sold at fairs), and umbrellas. Her products are in constant demand, so she needs to invest in more materials for making these items.

In addition, Ana Cristina has a small tortilla shop and needs to buy corn and firewood. For this reason, she approached FAPE about requesting a new loan.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood for her tortilla shop.

loans.name: Santa Rosa De Collana Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SANTA ROSA DE COLLANA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mauricia ella es soltera y tiene 40 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de pan, la socia prepara pan y luego los vende en los diferentes mercados,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora y por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de pan. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar ingredientes como azucar,harina,huevos,mantequilla y leche para preparar el pan.


Las socias que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, negocio de servicio de taxi, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de crianza de animales.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank “SANTA ROSA DE COLLANA.” This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Mauricia. She is single and 40 years old. The member works in the business of selling bread. She makes bread and later sells it in the different markets. Mauricia is an enterprising and hardworking woman. She wants to raise her children by means of this small business. 

The member works from 8:00am to 6:00pm. Through this loan she wishes to get ahead, and her goal is to expand her business of bread sales. The member requests the loan in order to buy ingredients such as flour, sugar, butter and milk in order to make bread.

The members whose images are attached to the group photo had their photos taken after the group meeting by request due to work conflicts.

The other members work in food sales, taxi services, grocery store sales, and raising livestock.

The member thanks those who are a part of this dream through these means and she promises to make her payments on the established deadlines.

loans.use: buy ingredients like sugar, flour, eggs, butter and milk to make bread.

loans.name: Yeredeme Group
